response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and add substantial value to your business. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its worth to be $1,000,000 to you. However, considering the exceptional quality and craftsmanship involved, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $900,000.

This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage over your competitors while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations and contribute to the growth and success of your organization.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to discuss its capabilities and how it can specifically benefit your business needs.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
